column4: Hey guys, me again.  I've been having problems with .avi files in Intrepid.  Is there possibly a diffrent .avi decoder I could use to probably solve this problem?  Or am I missing something?
or try mplayer, it plays almost anything you throw at it.
Alright, the MPlayer didn't solve the problem.
The main problem is that the video flickers.
I don't appear to be able to turn off the subtitles, nor enter into full screen though.
that's kinda bad solution, try disabling compiz or if you're using it and try if it works without -vo x11
It seems that the X11 will work in other players.  Thanks for the help!
yeah, but it doesnt change the fact that your video drivers are broken. thats a known bug in ati drivers and there's fix coming.
Alright, one last simple question.  How do I change the default video player to vlc?
I noticed ATi doesn't exactly have good drivers for much anything in the firstplace.
Thanks for solving my problems guys.  Much appreciated.
but hey, if you see updates to ati when upgrading, try changing x11 back to xv as it is accelerated and x11 is not.
